DOC.brief_summary: Decisions to limit life sustaining treatments are made for most patients dying in the ICU, usually with input from the family. The well-being of the family may be jeopardized by involvement in the decision-making process and bereavement. We evaluated the ability of a proactive communication strategy (family conference and providing family members with a bereavement information leaflet) designed to improve family well-being.
DOC.brief_title: A Communication Strategy for Families of Patients Dying in the ICU
DOC.criteria: family of dying patient family having no enough knowledge of French to respond to telephone interview patient alive on day 90
